data.impact: Unauthorized traffic will be allowed in this VRF.

VRF is in enforced mode. APIC policy for implicit deny log is not enforced on Leaf hardware.

info.value: APIC Policy and Switch Configuration are not matching on Leaf.

Check operational connectivity status between APIC and Leaf
  • If needed, schedule a maintenance window and re-apply affected contract policies between the identified EPG pair.
  • Run NI's Analysis post Policy Push and check if failure persists.
    • If failure persists, then call Cisco TAC.
APIC Policy is matching Switch Configuration.
APIC Policy & Switch Hardware are not matching on Leaf.

Check operational connectivity status between APIC and Leaf
  • If needed, schedule a maintenance window and re-apply affected contract policies between the identified EPG pair.
  • Run NI's Analysis post Policy Push and check if failure persists.
    • If failure persist, schedule a maintenance window and reboot leaf.
    After Leaf comes online, run NI's Analysis and check if failure persists.
    • If failure persist, then call Cisco TAC.
APIC Policy is matching Switch Hardware.
